Package org.universAAL.support.directives.checks

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodificationCheck  
    DecoupleCheck
    This checker will test whether the uAAL projects are being properly decoupled from OSGi.
    DependencyManagementCheckFix  
    FelixDepCheckFix  
    ItestsCheckFix
    This checker will test whether the uAAL projects have itest dependency, and if they have, then check for actual IntegrationTests.
    LicenseFileCheckFix
    Check that ASL2.0.txt and NOTICE.txt files Exists.
    LicenseHeaderCheckFix
    Check all the code has a valid ASL header.
